name: set_appointment
description: Sets an appointment in the associate's calendar

location_id.description: ID of the location where the appointment will take place

associate_id.description: ID of the associate for whom the appointment is being set

day.description: Date of the appointment in YYYY-MM-DD format

start_time.description: Start time of the appointment in HH:MM:SS format

end_time.description: End time of the appointment in HH:MM:SS format

summary.description: A brief summary of the appointment

attendee_emails.description: List of emails of attendees for the appointment
